## flt targets add

Add a GitOps target

### Synopsis

Add one or more key-value pairs to the "targets" array in app.yaml

```
flt targets add [flags]
```

### Examples

```
flt targets add region:east region:west
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for add
```
